data: ShadowWire is a group specialized in cybersecurity research and ethical hacking.
ShadowWire operates in the cybersecurity industry.
ShadowWire provides vulnerability assessments for public sector and private sector clients.
ShadowWire has discovered critical zero-day exploits and responsibly disclosed them to major software vendors.
ShadowWire operates with strict confidentiality and a rogue-coded ethos emphasizing privacy and discretion.
ShadowWire hosts annual secret summits for members to share techniques and collaboration opportunities.
ShadowWire has contributed to the development of open-source security tools that are widely used across the industry.
ShadowWire's location is not publicly disclosed.
